The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 February is 3,528,695 (6,269.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 February, there were 99,742 new confirmed cases (177.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 February, there were 138,354 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 28% (38,612 fewer cases).
